nodes.text: Makrin City was the capital city of Shelkonwa. It billed itself as the Second City of Spires, a reference to ancient Coruscant. It contained the Nightowk Repository and a governor's palace. Farfarn District was an area of the city.

It had three spaceports: Makrin Main Spaceport, Greencliff Regional Spaceport, and the palace port. All of the city spaceports were shut down in 0.5 ABY by Vilim Disra in a failed attempt to capture Princess Leia and give her to the Galactic Empire.
